overview: We start out with inked-to perfection Rico hanging out his window when he spots Scout on the street. It doesn't take much to convince Scout to join him in his sun-filled bedroom for some amazing, bareback debauchery, which is topped off by Rico ass-ramming Scout's smooth butt into next week! There is a whole lot of action in Butthole Bukakke! And you won't want to miss a single drop! Featuring a 15 man Butthole Bukakke scene!
title: Butthole Bukakke
